data.message:
Alot of people didn't like what Eminem had to say.
So I am going to explain in a whole nother way
And if you disagree it's probably because you can't see 
Past your phone or TV
Watching the Kardashians thinking that shits reality.
Same people learned how to fight watching Jerry springer
They grew up with no voice they could never be a singer
Your dreams been trashed 
Our flag been bashed 
On history erased 
For a future of only one race
They want us to divide 
So they fill our heads with lies 
Send us off to war yet pay us like the poor 
While sports make more 
And watch as the kneel before the flag 
Not even knowing why their mad 
Makeing Americans look sad 
Pathetic and weak
Can't unite for the one thing that means the most
Our history is now a ghost
Social security almost toast
Veterans on the streets 
Starving to eat 
While others get free food because they have given knew lives to the streets
But what about the people who risk their lives for you to eat
You pass by them in the streets 
You won't look them in the eye you stay looking at their feet 
But the didn't hestitate to see who you might be
They just risk their lives while others take a knee
How is this for some reality
Or are you still watching tv
Brain being manipulated and distorted
From all the crap that gets reported
Now even your dreams are being imported
And your every move being recorded
And instead of fight some take a knee 
Hidden behind a corrupt presidency
You think you get a say in who makes America great
Well if that's the case 
Why has no one taken trumps place.
When he spits in a war heros face
And you call what Eminem did a discrace
Well you can tell me how his dick taste 
While the whole world is about I riot or two away 
From taking back our country and saying God bless the usa
Some of you don't realize 
Because you been fed so many lies 
Eating beef that's been disquised 
Without actions comes no surprise 
And will lead to our demise
While that tv looks fun 
They are taking all the guns 
Violating our rights 
Advertising racial fights
Hoping that we never unite 
But that's our choice to make 
So everyone should stand and make no mistake
We the people is what will make America great
